name: nekonekonii
bio: Small content creator, love spreading joy and positivity!
messages: Hiii! My friend Nancy's birthday is tomorrow could you say happy birthday??
Well I guess a happy birthday for today, it's past midnight in my city haha
Anyways yeah can you say happy birthday to Nancy?
She loves your streams, please say happy birthday
appeal_message: I just wanted nancy to be told happy birthday by her fav streamer, idk why i got banned, plz unban :(
